Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Reliability", "CA2000:Dispose objects before losing scope", Justification="Response is disposed by caller.")

Docs.summary: Gets the version of a table item from the HTTP IfMatch header. If the IfMatch contains an invalid value then an is thrown containing an with status code .
Docs.returns: A valid version byte array representing the version, or null if none were present.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> SetSelectedProperties (this System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, Type data, out bool isModified);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> SetSelectedProperties(class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage request, class System.Type data, bool isModified) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Design", "CA1021:AvoidOutParameters", Justification="It's ok to have an out parameter here.")

Docs.param: The type of the data model.
Indicates whether the original Request URI $select clause has been manipulated or not.
Docs.summary: Determines the set of properties to include in the OData $select query option for types implementing the interface. This function determines the set of selected properties and updates the request URI accordingly, if necessary.
Docs.returns: In the case of a type implementing, the set of properties selected; otherwise null.
Docs.remarks: The query is not actually validated in this step -- this happens as part of the validation.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Design", "CA1021:AvoidOutParameters", Justification="It's ok to have an out parameter here.")

Docs.param: The type of the data model.
Optional map specifying replacement names for system properties.
Indicates whether the original Request URI $select clause has been manipulated or not.
Docs.summary: Determines the set of properties to include in the OData $select query option for types implementing the interface. This function determines the combined set of selected properties and updates the request URI accordingly, if necessary.
Docs.returns: In the case of a type implementing, the set of properties selected; otherwise null.
Docs.remarks: The query is not actually validated in this step -- this happens as part of the validation.
